channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description: ...........anyone know how to get rid of safe zones.......... cause my entire castle wars area is a safe zone for some reason..... and noone can kill each other and theres no point in castle wars if you can't kill each other..... so anyone know how to make it so ou can atack each other......

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

…i dunno which to delete…

this is what i found when i search inwildy…

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }
…

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

Okay, so go into your client.java and find the inWildy boolean. In there are the coords for safe zones. Find the one with castle wars coords in it and delete it.

Read full topic
